 # nFloat Theme - [![Download](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-%233a71c1.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/Nate2898/nFloat-Discordtheme/releases/download/Version1/nFloat.theme.css) <!--[![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/🌐_Website-5865F2)](https://nate2898.github.io/)  -->

A new practical customizable compact Discord theme that cascades most of the sidebars and changes depending on the size of the window.

Up to date with the latest versions of Discord, works with both [BetterDiscord](https://betterdiscord.app/) and [Vencord](https://vencord.dev/).

### Install 
Put the ****nFloat.theme.css**** file in your themes folder. You can find the themes folder by going to **User Settings > Themes > Open Themes Folder** in Discord.

### Preview
![Screenshot](./images/nFloat.gif)

### Customizable Options
You can customize the theme by changing the following values in the **nFloat.theme.css** file. T
```css
--sidebar-delay-close: 1.3s; /* Delay before the sidebar closes when not hovered Default: 1.3s */
--sidebar-closed-width: 64px; /* Width of the sidebar when not hovered Default: 64px */
--member-list-width-open:267px; /* Width of the member list when hovered Default: 267px */
--member-list-width-close: 62px; /* Width of the member list when not hovered Default: 62px */
--member-list-delay-open: 0s; /* Delay before the member list opens when hovered Default: 0s */
--member-list-delay-close: 0s; /* Delay before the member list closes when not hovered Default: 0s */
```
